# isEmpty

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the segment is empty.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

An empty segment has a valid target time range, but its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCompositionTrackSegment/sourceURL] value is `nil` and the source start time is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid]. It doesn’t set values for its other properties.

## Accessing segment properties

- **sourceURL**: A URL of the container file whose media this track segment presents.
- **sourceTrackID**: An identifier of a track in the container file whose media this track segment presents.
